document.id: City of San Mateo, Cal., Ord. No. 2013-12
document.heading: Amending Section 7.38.340, “Record Keeping Requirements,” and Section 7.38.360, “Self-Monitoring Requirements,” of Chapter 7.38, “Sanitary Sewer Use,” of the San Mateo Municipal Code to Add Record Keeping Requirements and an Industrial User Waiver Process for Industrial Users of the City Sewer System
